Recent Bridge-way Diner&Restaurant Reviews A diner from Old Bridge, NJ gave an overall rating of on August 2, 2009 @ 12:36 PM
I only eat here because the location is nearby. The food is ok at best and the owners watch how much you eat at the salad bar. They will ask you to pay the bill before you're ready to leave. The service is lousy and the bathrooms are never clean. No comparison to some of the finer diners in NJ and NY. » See All Old Bridge Restaurant Coupons & Deals
